title: Foreign Secy holds Eid reception for ICT police, security personnel
content:
ISLAMABAD, May 5 (APP): Foreign Secretary Sohail Mahmood Thursday held an Eid greetings reception for the officials and security personnel stationed at the Ministry of Foreign Affairs here.
FS Sohail Mahmood hosted an #EidUlFitr greetings event for @ict_police officials & security personnel stationed at @ForeignOfficePk today. FS recognized the dedication & commitment of the security staff Thanked them on Ministry’s behalf for their valuable contributions. pic.twitter.com/1wj9iTWROj
The foreign secretary recognized the dedication and the commitment of the security staff during the dispensation of their duties.
He also thanked them on behalf of the ministry for their valuable contributions.
